name: Confronting Morality
description:
As of now, the most polished prototype we have made! Based on initial feedback we have unfortunately decided to can the project and move in a different direction.

There are a couple systems included that haven't been fully fleshed out, such as the [tab] map menu. Feel free to experiment with the 3 extra Skills points!

If you get stuck, don't forget to look closely behind trees and across the water! The Prototype is over upon reaching the Victory screen.

Controls:
w,a,s,d - move
space - attack
left shift - dash
q, e - abilities
tab - open the map menu
esc - exit fullscreen, esc again to open pause menu

All Scripts, Art, and Music are original creations by ParrTay. Other than using the Unity game engine, it was quite fun trying to make this game from scratch!

The Bonus is a boss we created for a previous iteration of this game. It is quite difficult! I would be thoroughly impressed if you managed to find all 5 pieces of bread without dying, as the boss keeps coming back.

*This game was built to be played on a 1080p monitor, and is fixed to the 16:9 aspect ratio. I recommend hitting the full screen button in the lower right corner. Press esc to exit full screen and esc again to open the pause menu.
